short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play a Notification Sound when receiving a message in the background with service worker. Also keep chrome running in background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play a Notification Sound when receiving a message in the background with service worker at https://www.safesa.co.za/track. Also keep chrome running in background to receive messages even if it closes.
